name: millvi WP
author: 株式会社エビリー

sections.description:
millvi WP is a plugin that can easily save, control and stream videos through WordPress that we provide to the customers using a cloud-based video streaming system “millvi”.

This plugin is provided free, but the video streaming system “millvi” is a pay service.
Please contact from the below if you would like to contract.
[Contact Form] (https://millvi.jp/lpv/inquiry.html#docs “contact”)

After downloading or installing the plugin, you could start the service by entering a client ID, user ID (id user), password and a secret key that is used in millvi.

Paste tag that millvi WP issues could be pasted on the other site, not only used in the WordPress posting and to be moved from the fixed page.

Please check the detail in millvi WordPress plugin page.

[millvi WordPress plugin page] (https://millvi.jp/millvi_plugin/)
sections.installation:
*Normal Installation
1. Open ‘Plugin ->Add New’ of your WordPress site, search ‘millvi WP’ in search box.
2. Click ‘Install Now’ button that come up in ‘millvi WP’ to install the plugin.
3. After completing the installation, click the ‘Activate’ button.

*Direct Installation
1. Upload the ‘millvi-wp’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
2. Open the plugin from the ‘Plugin Menu’.
3. Choose ‘Account Setting’ from ‘millvi WP’ menu, register the information and start the service.
sections.faq:
What function does this plugin have?

Security: High security video streaming is available through Streaming Distribution and Domain Restriction.
Player Customize: You could use the effective way of showing that were in the site in the smartphone site as well by the responsive correspondence.
Report: It is possible to measure which video is seen how many times
Load Distribution: The video will not stop even if the access is concentrated.
Multiple bit rate Distribution: Image quality is selectable in PC, and the smartphone provides the video in the suitable image quality according to the connection status.

Is this plugin available for free?

Plugin could be used for free. In addition, you need to contract the video streaming system ‘millvi’ to be used.

Where can I find the document?

[Plugin Outline] (https://millvi.jp/millvi_plugin/ “about”)
[Video Streaming System ‘millvi’] (https://millvi.jp/lpv/ “millvi”)
[Contact Form] (https://millvi.jp/lpv/inquiry.html#docs “contact”)
